item.title: CVE-2021-26360|2024-09-16T22:56:17.356Z -- amd -- amd%20radeon%20rx%206000%20series%20%26%20pro%20w6000%20series
item.description: An attacker with local access to the system can make unauthorized modifications of the security configuration of the SOC registers. This could allow potential corruption of AMD secure processorâ€™s encrypted memory contents which may lead to arbitrary code execution in ASP.
